author: Julie A Hood

review: I really enjoy using this box. Quick response time and half the price of similar gadgets like apple tv. Really easy to maneuver and loaded for prime members. Some people have connection problems, but that's not because of the firestick, it's from people having low MBPS (megabytes per second ) from their Internet provider. The stick works perfectly with a strong WiFi signal, just like any other streaming device.
author: joseph maese
